org.mindroid.api

Class ImperativeAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mindroid.api.BasicAPI
      • org.mindroid.api.ImperativeAPI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImperativeWorkshopAPI

    public abstract class ImperativeAPI
extends org.mindroid.api.BasicAPI
    This Class defines the basic Imperative Implementation API.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImperativeAPI

        public ImperativeAPI(java.lang.String implementationID)
        Parameters:
        implementationID - - The ID of your Implementation. Necessary to run your implementation later on.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public abstract void run()
        Implementation of the robots behavior. This method will be executed by the imperative Engine. Note: To stop the execution of this implementation properly all loops have to exit when the method isInterrupted isInterruptedreturns true!

      • start

        public final void start()
        Start the execution of the Implementation Executes run method. Stops all motors, when execution finished/got interrupted.

      • stopExecution

        public final void stopExecution()
        Sets the isInterrupted field to true to stop the execution of this method

      • getImplementationID

        public final java.lang.String getImplementationID()

      • isInterrupted

        public final boolean isInterrupted()
        Returns true, when stop stopExecution() got called.
        Returns:
        true, when execution should stop

      • delay

        public final void delay(long milliseconds)
        This method waits until the given amount of time has passed. This method is blocking.
        Parameters:
        milliseconds - the time in milliseconds

      • isExecutionFinished

        public final boolean isExecutionFinished()
        Returns true, if execution has finished otherwise false
        Returns:
        true, if execution has finished.
